text: It would be nice if we could have modules (or at least custom ones) be re-usable as parts of other modules. For example, having a card & a custom button module - and rather than needing to copy all the fields over from the button module to have a a button option within the card module, the ability to just say "use the same fields as the `button.module`" would be helpful and help with component composition and keeping things DRY.
